bba.title: The Bachelor of Business Administration
bba.subtitle: The Bachelor of Business Administration
bba.description: The Bachelor of Business Administration (Top-Up) is a one-year final-stage program designed for students who already hold a Level 5 qualification or equivalent diploma and wish to complete a full bachelor's degree.
bba.fullDescription: This program focuses on advanced business concepts, strategic thinking, leadership, and real-world professional skills. It provides a direct pathway for students to upgrade their current qualification to an internationally recognized BBA degree — with the flexibility and affordability that LAMS is known for.

overview.title: Who Is This Programme For?
content: This Top-Up programme is ideal for:
Students with a Level 5 Diploma, HND, or Associate Degree
Learners seeking to complete their bachelor's degree in just one year
Working professionals needing a flexible and cost-effective progression route
International students who require a globally recognised qualification for career or postgraduate study (e.g., MBA)

structure.title: Program Structure
content: Leadership and People Management
Operations Management
Financial Decision Making
Sustainable Business Practices
Strategic Human Resource Management
Business Research Project
Final Project

outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
content: Apply strategic and analytical thinking to complex business problems
Demonstrate leadership, communication, and decision-making skills
Understand global markets and international business trends
Conduct research and present a professional business project
Progress toward postgraduate studies such as an MBA or relevant Master’s degrees

requirements.title: Academic Requirements
content: Level 5 Diploma in Business (or related field)
Higher National Diploma (HND) in Business or equivalent
International Diploma / Associate Degree equivalent to 2 years of undergraduate study
Additional requirements
Official transcripts
Statement of purpose
Updated CV for mature-entry applicants

english.title: English Language Requirements
content: IELTS Academic 6.0 (minimum 5.5 in each band)
TOEFL iBT 70
PTE Academic 50
LAMS Placement Test
Proof of previous study in English (subject to verification)

mba.title: The Master of Business Administration
mba.subtitle: The Master of Business Administration
mba.description: The Master of Business Administration (MBA) is a one- to two-year advanced programme designed for students who already hold an undergraduate degree in business, management, or a related field. This programme emphasizes leadership, strategic management, innovation, and evidence-based decision-making. It prepares students for senior management and executive roles in a variety of industries, providing a pathway to globally recognised qualifications with the flexibility and affordability that LAMS is known for.

overview.title: Who Is This Programme For?
content: This MBA programme is ideal for:
Graduates holding a bachelor’s degree in business, management, or a related discipline
Professionals seeking to accelerate their career into leadership or executive roles
Working managers looking for a flexible learning option while continuing employment
International students aiming for a globally recognised qualification to advance their careers or pursue doctoral studies
Individuals planning to work in strategic, operational, or managerial positions across corporate, public, or entrepreneurial settings

structure.title: Program Structure
content: Students complete advanced-level modules such as:
Strategic Management
Strategic Leadership
Strategic Human Resource Management
Globalisation and Corporate Governance
Strategic Financial Management
Advanced Business Research Methods
Work-based Project

outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
content: By the end of the MBA programme, students will be able to:
Apply advanced leadership, management, and decision-making principles in diverse business contexts
Understand global business trends, corporate governance, and regulatory frameworks
Develop innovative strategies for sustainable business growth and competitive advantage
Analyse organisational performance, operational efficiency, and market dynamics
Conduct applied research and present professional business solutions
Progress toward doctoral-level studies such as DBA or PhD in Business Administration

requirements.title: Academic Requirements
content: Applicants must meet one of the following entry criteria:
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or a related field
International undergraduate degree equivalent to a UK bachelor’s degree
Relevant professional qualifications with substantial managerial experience (for mature-entry applicants)
Additional requirements:
Official transcripts
Statement of purpose
Updated CV for mature-entry applicants
References (academic or professional)

language_requirements.title: English Language Requirements
content: Students must provide one of the following:
IELTS Academic 6.5 (minimum 6.0 in each band)
TOEFL iBT 80
PTE Academic 58
LAMS Placement Test
Proof of previous study in English (subject to verification)

dba.title: The Doctor of Business Administration
dba.subtitle: The Doctor of Business Administration
dba.description: The Doctor of Business Administration (DBA) is a two- to five-year advanced professional doctoral programme designed for experienced managers, executives, entrepreneurs, and professionals who already hold a master’s degree in business, management, or a related field. This programme emphasizes strategic leadership, organisational transformation, applied research, and evidence-based decision-making at the highest level. It prepares candidates for senior executive roles, academic careers, consultancy, and thought leadership, offering a pathway to globally recognised doctoral qualifications with the flexibility and affordability that LAMS is known for.

overview.title: Who Is This Programme For?
content: This DBA programme is ideal for:
Graduates holding a master’s degree in business, management, or a related discipline.
Senior professionals seeking to advance into executive leadership, consultancy, or organisational development roles.
Academics or lecturers aiming to enhance their research credentials and career prospects.
Entrepreneurs looking to combine practical business insight with advanced research capabilities.
Individuals planning to contribute to strategic, organisational, or policy-level decision-making at corporate, governmental, or international levels.

structure.title: Program Structure
content: Students complete advanced doctoral-level modules such as:
Developing Strategic Management and Leadership Potential.
Managing Strategic Change.
Project Development, Planning and Management.
Advanced Research Design and Methodologies.
Developing Research Capability.
Strategic Financial Management.
Entrepreneurship and Innovation.
Globalisation and Corporate Governance.
Dissertation.

outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
content: By the end of the DBA programme, students will be able to:
Demonstrate advanced leadership, strategic analysis, and organisational development capabilities.
Understand global business dynamics, governance frameworks, and emerging management trends.
Develop innovative, research-based solutions to complex business and organisational challenges.
Analyse strategic, financial, operational, and market performance at an executive level.
Design and conduct applied research that contributes to professional practice and organisational improvement.
Progress toward academic careers or senior executive roles as research-informed leaders.

requirements.title: Academic Requirements
content: Applicants must meet one of the following entry criteria:
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or a related field
International undergraduate degree equivalent to a UK bachelor’s degree
Relevant professional qualifications with substantial managerial experience (for mature-entry applicants)
Additional requirements:
Official transcripts
Statement of purpose
Updated CV for mature-entry applicants
References (academic or professional)

language_requirements.title: English Language Requirements
content: Students must provide one of the following:
IELTS Academic 6.5 (minimum 6.0 in each band)
TOEFL iBT 80
PTE Academic 58
LAMS Placement Test
Proof of previous study in English (subject to verification)
